definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: There is considerably less chance of an even-numbered error that eludes the B2 parity calculation.
sentences.chinese: 有偶数不到B2奇偶校验计算的错误的机会大大减少。

sentences.english: Even numbers usually are for funerals.
sentences.chinese: 通常葬礼上才送偶数数目的花儿。

sentences.english: A valid custom delimiter must have an even number of hexadecimal digits.
sentences.chinese: 有效的自定义分隔符必须具有偶数个十六进制数字。

sentences.english: Is it an even number or an odd number?
Here's another way I could do that.
sentences.chinese: 如果b是偶数的话，a的b次方。

sentences.english: How many four-digit positive integers have their product of digits even?
sentences.chinese: 数字之积为偶数的四位正整数共有多少个？

sentences.english: Have the same number of even three-dimensional primitive Pythagorean Solution and algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 有相同偶数的三维本原勾股数求解及算法。

sentences.english: The design method and features of even-numbered Dammann gratings are presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 分析了偶数点阵达曼光栅的设计原理与特性。

sentences.english: Thus, again, only the even numbers will be passed to the body of the loop itself.
sentences.chinese: 因此，只将偶数传递给了循环主体本身。

sentences.english: This method is applicable both to odd and even multiple numbers of clock code frequency.
sentences.chinese: 这个方法对奇数倍钟码或偶数倍钟码均适用。

sentences.english: An even number of crossings means that the point is not in an area to be filled or clipped.
sentences.chinese: 偶数的交叉表示点不在要填满或裁剪的区域中。

sentences.english: All brands of balls, except one, have even-numbered dimples.
sentences.chinese: 所有品牌的球，只有一个，有偶数酒窝。

sentences.english: That explains why there are no even-cycle cicadas.
sentences.chinese: 这也解释了为什么没有生命周期为偶数的蝉。

sentences.english: He then told me that 101 was an odd number and 1 million was an even number, etc.
sentences.chinese: 接着又告诉我说101是奇数，一百万是偶数等等。

sentences.english: Senators are chosen in statewide elections held in even-numbered years.
sentences.chinese: 参议员经各州偶数年举行的选举产生。

sentences.english: In particular, as the multiple number of the root is even, the problem has two solutions.
sentences.chinese: 特别地，当这种根的重数为偶数时，问题具有二重解。

definition: composite number (i.e. not prime, has a factorization)
remainder (after rounding a number)/decimal part (of number after the decimal point)/mantissa (i.e. fractional part of common logarithm in math.)/small change/balance (of an account)
positive odd number (also written 奇數|奇数)/singular (grammar)
the units place (or column) in the decimal system
to divide exactly without remainder (in integer arithmetic)/exact division
